attr.name: record-type
attr.label: Record Type
attr.tooltipmessage: Choose: Door, Area, Output, Input, Variable

regex.message: Enter one of: Door, Area, Output, Input, Variable or System (for monitoring)

attr.name: record-command
attr.label: Command
attr.tooltipmessage:
Door: Lock, Unlock, Latch
Area: Disarm, Disarm 24hr, Disarm All, Arm, Force Arm, Stay Arm, Instant Arm
Output: Off, On, On Timed
Input: Remove Bypass, Temporary Bypass, Permanent Bypass
Variable: Set

regex.message:
Valid options are:
Door: Lock, Unlock, Latch
Area: Disarm, Disarm 24hr, Disarm All, Arm, Force Arm, Stay Arm, Instant Arm
Output: Off, On, On Timed
Input: Remove Bypass, Temporary Bypass, Permanent Bypass
Variable: Set

validations.regex: (?i)(Lock|Unlock|Latch|Disarm|Disarm 24hr|Disarm All|Arm|Force Arm|Stay Arm|Instant Arm|Off|on|on Timed|Remove Bypass|Temporary Bypass|Permanent Bypass|Set){1}

attr.name: record-index
attr.label: Record Index
attr.tooltipmessage: Select the record index from the Protege Controller

attr.name: record-value
attr.label: Record Value
attr.tooltipmessage: For outputs and variables, set a numeric value. For input monitoring select from Door, Area, Output, Input and Variable

regex.message: Valid entries are 0-9 or Door, Area, Output, Input, Variable
